title: Bobby Garland Slab Slayer Black Chartreuse Silver 2"
features: A favorite bait of crappie fishermen nationwide
Provides the perfect combination of a solid body and a thin spear tail for enticing crappie and other game fish
The body stays in place on a jighead and gives fish a definite target
The tail wavers to entice strikes and causes the bait to glide on the fall and dart when twitched
description: A favorite bait of crappie fishermen nationwide, a Slab Slayer provides perfect combination of a solid body and a thin spear tail for enticing crappie. The body stays in place on a jighead and gives fish a definite target, while the tail wavers to entice strikes and causes the bait to glide on the fall and dart when twitched.
